mapper.insert: insert into project (pro_no, pro_comp, pro_title, pro_content, pro_period, pro_budget, pro_personnel, pro_field, pro_ok, pro_img) values(prono_seq.nextval, #{pro_comp},#{pro_title}, #{pro_content}, #{pro_period}, #{pro_budget}, #{pro_personnel}, #{pro_field}, 0, #{pro_img})
mapper.select: select pro_no, pro_title, pro_budget, pro_period, pro_personnel from project order by pro_no desc
select pro_content, pro_title, pro_budget, pro_period, pro_personnel, pro_comp from project where pro_no = #{pro_no}
